review_blob: Bottle from Hops & Crafts Exeter. Pours hazy orange with a loose head , aroma is gorgeous tropical fruits pink grapefruit ,melon, tangerine & lime, taste is dank hop lime,marmalade & grapefruit & alcohol coming thru with some chocolate & bitterness , the finish is more of the same with a growing dryness ,light bodied & smooth for the strength ,not quite as good as v2.

Bottle from Hops & Crafts Exeter,pours hazy Bronze loose white head,aroma gorgeously tropical hop fruity Melon,grapfruit ,tangerine ,lime & maybe a hint of chocolate,taste is dank hops melon ,passion fruit ,lime chocolate ,light bodied for the strength & smooth,the finish is alcohol warming,hoppy with some bitterness & a growing dryness.

Bottle from M&S; Exeter, pours clear pale gold with a massive white head,aroma of candy sugar, fresh bread & stone fruit,the taste is fruity & sweetish with fresh bread & candy sugar , the finish is more of the same with a growing dryness & some nice hop bitterness ,light bodied & drinkable the alcohol while evident is not overly obvious , this beer is very well made & nicely balanced.

Bottle from Hops & Crafts Exeter, pours hazy dark orange ,dank aroma of lime ,chocolate plus other tropical fruits , taste is hop fruity ,pine, lime ,grapefruit ,with a good malt base ,medium bodied & smooth very drinkable , the finish is hoppy bitter & dry ,a really decent brew!

Pours hazy orange light loose white head,aroma vanilla ,taste surprising complex , sourness,vanilla ,sour cherry ,sweetness with hop bitterness & some biscuity malt, light bodied ,smooth & very drinkable , the finish is more vanilla ,sourness ,hop bitterness,sweetness & more biscuit . Very interesting beer!

Bottle from M&S; Exeter,pours deep cherry red ,pink head soon vanishes leaving lacing ,gorgeous aroma of fresh cherries , taste tart cherry with some acidity ,really well balanced ,well carbonated & surprisingly light bodied , long tart cherry finish with some acidity. Nice!

Bottle from Hops & Crafts Exeter. Pours hazy bright gold large white head quickly deminishing ,, lemon bergamot aroma ,almost perfumey,smells tart & meringuish with underlying fresh bread ,banana & bubblegum , taste is complex & sweet with lemon , banana,bubblegum & fresh bread ,smooth palate & perfect carbonation ,light bodied & very drinkable ,more lemon ,banana ,bubblegum & bread in the long drying finish . This is a really good beer! Almost like liquid Lemon meringue !

Bottle from Hops & Crafts Exeter, pours hazy very pale gold with a big white head,light aroma of lemon sherbet ,fresh bread & coriander, taste is clean & refreshing & sweetish more lemon,melon , coriander ,fresh bread & bubble gum, very light bodied smooth & perfectly carbonated for the style ,super drinkable , the finish is fruity with fresh melon & sweetish with some dryness leaving u wanting to get stuck in for more ,this is a great summer refresher or just any time when u want a good refreshing beer.

Bottle from Hops & Crafts Exeter( a gift from the owner as the beer was just out of date,drunk 2 weeks after B.B date), pours golden with nice white head & lacing down the glass,lots yeast went into the glass from the first pour , I guess the date had something to do with that. Aroma Crisp light citrus aroma lemon,melon & orange peel, taste bittersweet with more hop flavours pinapple,melon & tangerine crisp & refreshing with nice pale malt support almost biscuity ,lightish bodied with a delightful mouthfeel & crisp happy dry finish ,really drinkable. Nice!

Bottle from Hops & Crafts Exeter,Deep gold almost bronze in colour ,nice white head 1 finger thick & tight leaving lacing down the glass,aroma tropical fruits pinapple ,melon with earthy malt & a kind of farmyard aroma,taste is melon ,marmalade hop & pineapple with some earthy malt ,good body slightly oily with just the right amount of carbonation ,the finish is hop fruity ,moderate bitterness & nice dryness with some earthy malt . All in all better than I expected after smelling the aroma.

Can from Hops & Crafts Exeter,pours near black with a thick brown head ,aroma is polished leather,dark chocolate with roasted notes ,taste is fantastic & complex ,bitter coffee ,dark chocolate , dark fruits, raisin & polished leather ,medium to heavy bodied ,oily the finish is long & complex more polished leather ,dark chocolate ,coffee & bitter hop flavours . Wow this is a GOOD beer !!!!

Bottle from Hops & Crafts Exeter,,pours hazy Gold with a thick white head ,aroma is a delightful mix of marmalade ,grapefruit ,pine & mango , the taste is full of hop flavours mango,pine,tangerine & grapefruit & intially sweet with growing bitterness & dryness ,smooth an light to medium bodied slightly oily ,the finish is long, hoppy & dry ,leaving you begging for more !!!

Can from Hops & Crafts Exeter,pours bronze with a dense white head,aroma is very piney with spicy notes,taste is initially sharply piney with good malt back up almost like burnt caramel & nice bitterness maybe slightly astringent leading into the pleasing bitter hoppy finish ,but for me what makes this beer stand out is its mouth feel smooth & medium bodied ,slightly oily with low to medium carbonation that kinda leaves u wanting more!

Can from Hops & Crafts Exeter,pours golden Amber with a nice white head,aroma of sweet piney hop ,marmalade & grapefruit,the taste is beautifully balanced piney hop ,grapefruit ,slight pepperiness,marmalade with balancing sweetness,herbal notes & a good malt body ,slowly becoming dry in the finish with more well balanced hop flavours. This is a classic pale ale & absolutely beautifully balanced. Sheer class!!!

Can from Hops & Crafts Exeter,pours hazy light gold with a thin white head. Delicious piney aroma of pineapple & grapefruit ,bittersweet taste of complex hop flavours ,pinapple ,grapefruit,mango & white grape ,light bodied & the alcohol thou present is well hidden,smooth with medium carbonation, the long finish is initially sharpish with mango ,pineapple,grapefruit & piney Hop,slowly becoming dry & more bitter , wow this is a class act!
UPDATED: MAR 24, 2016

Can from Hops & Crafts Exeter,pours slightly hazy bronze with a good white head,aroma tropical fruit,marmalade & caramel,taste is initially orangey with bitter hops coming thru & light sweet malt. Smooth & light bodied ,thou slightly oily with medium carbonation.The finish is dry bitter ,orange hoppy leaving me wanting more ,this is a very good session beer!
beer_name: Brighton Bier Island Records Session IPA

review_blob: Keg at The Beer Cellar Exeter,Hazy pale gold,little head ,but strong luscious peach aroma,taste is very peachy dry & a bit sour ,with grapefruit ,& lemon coming thru ,light bodied medium carbonation ,bitter ,sour, hoppy ,peachy finish ,interesting!!
beer_name: Wild Weather Peach of a Weekend

review_blob: Bottle from Hops & Crafts Exeter, pours clear bright gold ,white dense head. Fresh complex hop aroma,piney ,grapefruit & mango, taste is full of rich hop flavours & bittersweet & dry ,pinapple,mango,grapefruit & marmalade . Medium bodied & very drinkable long dry ,increasingly bitter ,tropical hop fruit finish. Class!!!

Can from Hops & Crafts Exeter,pours hazy gold ,thin head. Nice Aroma of fresh bread ,sourness & piney tropical hop,low condition ,fresh bread ,sourness, tropical hop in the bitter, dry taste ,light bodied & very drinkable ,Bready ,sour,bitter ,dry finish with some hop. All in all an interesting ,good session beer.

Bottle from hops & crafts Exeter. Pours hazy Amber , lovely strong aroma of bitter hops pear,,pepper & sweet malt. Taste Hop fruity & bitter with sweet malt ,medium bodied & very drinkable for 9%+ alcohol thou present is not to obvious ,marmalade hop,bitter,sweet malt fnish with good dryness . This is a gorgeous beer but definitely not a mild . Tastes like a ESB crossed with a barley wine,thou still a fantastic beer & dangerously drinkable !
beer_name: Buxton / Oedipus / Oproer Ring Your Mother 1832 XXXX Mild

review_blob: Can from Hops & Crafts Exeter,pours near black with a dark beige head,aroma is complex intense roast coffee up front wth chocolate & polished leather. The taste is equally complex bitter roasted coffee ,dark chocolate ,leather & dark fruits,medium bodied nicely carbonated . Long roasty coffee ,dark chocolate ,bitter ,dry finish . Hmmmm nice!!!

Can from Hops & Cafts Exeter, pours hazy pale gold, small white head, Gorgeous peachy ,piney hop aroma ..Taste is more piney hop ,grapefruit ,peach & lime . Light bodied not obvious this is 8.5% thou some alcohol in the taste but well hidden,finish is bone dry & bitter with more hop ,gorgeous!!! This Should be a perminent beer , I want more !

Bottle from Hops & Crafts Exeter,pours clear golden with a thick rapidly diminishing white head. Complex Belgian yeast & hop aroma , candy sugar ,fresh bread & tangerine ,. Taste is hoppy more tangerine plus piney hop ,more Belgian yeast flavours ,candy sugar & bread along with good bitterness & some dryness , the finish is hoppy,spicy  ,bitter & Savoury. A really good interesting beer,blending Belgian techniques with a really good IPA.

Bottle from hops & Crafts Exeter.Pours hazy pale gold with a loose white head, gorgeous fresh complex hoppy aroma,citrus ,grapefruit & piney hop almost jammy! Taste is bittersweet & hop fruity more grapefruit,pinapple & melon ,a bit Jammy with warming alcohol,scaring light bodied & easy to drink for 9.6% light to medium carbonation ,the finish is long & bitter with sweet hop fruit all the way thru, this beer is class!!!

Can from Hops & Crafts Exeter,pours hazy gold with a thick foam collar (bbe date 21/02/16). Complex hoppy aroma melon ,marmalade & grapefruit ,full hoppy taste piney ,bitter sweet & very hop fruity ,grapefruit ,pinapple ,marmalade & melon ,light to medium bodied, oily . Long dry bittersweet grapefruit/ marmalade hop finish . Nice!

Can from hops & crafts Exeter,,pours hazy gold thick foamy head , Aroma of strong piney hop & orange notes ,bitter taste of marmalade & piney hop ,lightish bodied oily & with balancing sweetness ,long dry ,bitter piney hop finish leaving you wanting more . A good session beer !

Bottle from Hops & Crafts Exeter , pours clear pale gold spritzy rapidly vanishing head ,zesty orange peel aroma,sourness up front in the taste along with zesty orange dryness & bitterness ,light bodied & very spritzy,hops kick in in the satisfying orangey ,biscuity long dry finish . Really good for a low strength beer ,I could drink a lot of this !

Bottle from Hops & Crafts Exeter,pours near black with a thick light beige head. Aroma is complex dark malts,dark fruits caramel,vanilla ,piney hop, coffee & chocolate ,the taste is equally complex with piney hop ,coffee ,roasted malt ,caramel,vanilla & chocolate vying for attention ,but definitely hop up front before the malt hits ,surprising light bodied & very drinkable ,hoppy ,malty bitter finish . Top beer!!!

Can from Hops & Crafts Exeter,pours black with a big beige head,aroma of roasted malt,liquorice ,polished leather & vanilla , taste is complex roasted mal,vanilla ,liquorice ,hop fruit ,polished leather ,chocolate & alcohol , the palate is smooth a bit oily with a long complex fnish , dark malt ,leather ,coffee ,chocolate ,bitter with some dryness & liquorice ,satisfying imperial stout thou I cant detect much smokiness ,nevertheless this is a Good imperial stout ,sheer class !!!
beer_name: Beavertown Imperial Lord Smog Almighty (Barrel Aged)

review_blob: Can from Hops & Crafts Exeter, pours shiny very dark brown ,near black with a loose beige head, Not massively aggressive aroma of roasted coffee bean & chocolate , taste s roasted malt , mocha & subtle hop fruitiness , the finish s dry ,roasty ,bitter & fruity , gorgeous smooth bodied . A first class porter!
beer_name: Northern Monk Northern Star Mocha Porter

review_blob: Can from Hops & Crafts Exeter, Pours clear gold ,white tight head ,slowly diminishing ,leaving light lacing,Aroma is tropical , grapefruit ,lemon ,tangerine & piney . Taste is sweet hop soon becoming bitter,,juicy hop fruit ,piney & tangy ,light bodied ,decent carbonation , with long dry bitter grapefruit ,lemon finish . Well made !!!

Bottle from Hops & Crafts Exeter, pours dark brown with a beige rapidly diminishing head .. Heady Aroma of malt ,candy sugar, chocolate  & dark fruit , the taste is well balanced dark fruity & malty with candy sugar,chocolate  & bread , medium bodied , drinks well for its strength , dry fruit cakey long finish . Class !!!

Can from Hops & Crafts Exeter, Aroma is a delightful hoppy mix of grapefruit & pinapple , the beer pours slightly hazy pale gold with a rapidly diminishing white head the taste is hoppy grapefruit up front , butterscotch with piney hop which is bitter but also with some balancing sweetness , light bodied with a hop fruity bitter  dry finish . This is a solid good Scottish brewed American style iPA & my guilty pleasure !

Bottle from hops & crafts Exeter, pours clear darkish gold with a thick diminishing white head. Aroma not strong for an iPA but Bready,slightly piney,sprucedy hop , taste is nicely bitter hoppy with a good malt background more piney hop, pineapple & good bitterness ,well balance . Medium bodied with hoppy long bitter finish . This one is s grower . Nice!

Pours hazy pale gold with a quickly diminishing loose white Head . The Aroma is of fresh pink grapefruit, the taste is lemon sherbety, gooseberry sharp & lipsmacking & sour , wow what a hit ! Nice !light bodied with above average carbinination , the finish is long with more grapefruit coming thru ,lemon sherbty,goosebury ,tangy ,sour ,bitter & dry . This is a classy brew from Buxton if you can handle it !

Bottle from Hops & Crafts Exeter. Pours hazy pale gold with a loose white head rapidly diminishing .Aroma of fresh pink grapefruit , taste is sharp lip smacking lemon sherbet tangy , sour & bitter with grapfruit coming thru in the aftertaste which is long lemon sherbety ,tangy ,dry & bitter ,average to lively carbonation light bodied & very drinkable . This is a classy brew from Buctn
UPDATED: FEB 24, 2016

Bottle from Hops & Crafts Exeter. Pours Clear & golden with a big head quickly reducing . Aroma is of spice , bubblegum ,banana & feint toffee . Taste is sweet malt, clove , banana & slight toffee , smooth medium bodied with average carbonation ,the finish is bittersweet dry & long with some slight sourness  . A well balanced subtle & delicious saison.
UPDATED: APR 6, 2016

Can from hops & crafts in Exeter.Aroma of fresh ripe grapefruit ,juicy! Appearance slightly hazy,thick foam head reducing to finger thickness with good lacing . Taste sweet grapefruit to the fore mixed with hops becoming bitter & dry also biscuity malt ,medium body average carbonation smooth but slightly prickly,finish dry,hoppy ,slightly fruity leaving you wanting more! Overall a nice interesting brew that leave you coming back for more . Nice one!

Can form hops & crafts Exeter.Aroma sweet hop pineapple ,peach & tangerine, appearance hazy & golden, toast gloriously hoppy sweet pineapple ,grapefruit ,tangerine sweet but bitterness quickly kicking in followed by hoppy bitter dryness , not well balance but who cares about balance when a beer is this good? Top beer!

Bottle from hops & crafts Exeter . Near black with a dark beige head . Aroma s dark fruits & malt ,but doesnt prepare you for the taste explosion to follow which is complex piney hop,pineapple?sweet malt ,chocolate ,coffee & polished leatherw,the palate is smooth ,oily medium to full bodied ,medium carbonation ,bitter sweet ,dry ,salty malty ,hoppy finish . Imperial Russian Stout as it should be !!!

Can from hops & crafts in Exeter .Aroma Piney hop,dark fruits,pineapple , appearance dark ruby,beige head ,good lacing , taste piney hop,roasted malt ,dry with good bitterness .,palate medium body & carbonation ,slightly oily hoppy ,malty & bitter finish . Nice beer!

Bottle from hops & crafts Exeter. Complex aroma pineapple , sweet stewed fruits,dark fruit & dark malts. Dark ruby almost black with a beige head ,taste initially fruity & sweet but with bittering hops ,dryness & dark malts quickly kicking in & feint rye crackerness that builds in the aftertaste,palate is sweet hop fruity & dry with more dark malts slightly oily & soft with medium carbonation . Classy beer , should be a world classic !
beer_name: Firestone Walker Wookey Jack Black Rye IPA

review_blob: 330ml can from hops & crafts in Exeter.Aroma sweet piney hop,grapefruit& dark fruits. Appearance dark slightly hazy. Taste very hoppy not as malty as expected , palate lighter in body than expected slightly oilly medium carbonation , finish is dry & hoppy with roasted malt just about coming thru.. This beer is Awesome definitely the best dark iPa I have tryed.
